name: Undivided Heart
title: Ganyu: Undivided Heart
desc: First the arrow strikes, and then it turns to frost.

source: Reward for inviting Ganyu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1101], equip this card.
After $[A1101] equips this card, immediately use $[S11013] once.
When your $[A1101], who has this card equipped, uses $[S11013]: Cryo DMG dealt by this Skill +1 if this Skill has been used before during this match, and it now deals 3 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby instead.
(You must have $[A1101] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
